general_advisory: For paddy cultivation, always use certified seeds. Germination test is advisable before sowing. Use appropriate agricultural practices for maize, sugarcane, papaya, and poultry to ensure healthy growth and maximize yields.

advisory: Incorporate the dhaincha green manuring crop at the time of initial puddling of the main field.
Apply full dose of Phosphorus and Potash as basal dose.
To avoid infestation of Fall Army Worm, treat seeds with Cyantraniliprole19.8%+ Thiamethoxam 19.8% FS.
Managing early shoot borer infestation is crucial to protect crop health.
Apply recommended insecticides in case of severe infestation.
Plant papaya seedlings at optimal distances and use disease-resistant varieties for better results.
Ensure proper ventilation in poultry sheds during the rainy season.
Regular deworming and vaccination are essential for poultry health.
